Additionally, ground within the area becomes difficult terrain until cleared. Each 5-foot-square portion of the area requires at least 1 minute to clear by hand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Shelter from Energy
entries: Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder, and choose up to six willing creatures you can see within range. For the duration, targets have resistance to that damage type.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you may target up to one additional willing creature for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Shining Armor
entries: You wreathe yourself in weightless magical armoring crafted from plates of pure light. Until the spell ends, you shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an extra 20 feet. You also gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: When a creature within 10 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, the plates burst with beams of light. The attacker takes {@damage 3d6} radiant damage, and other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you take half that damage.
Attacks made against you have disadvantage.
У вас есть сопротивление к лучевому урону.

entries: In addition, if you are critically hit before the spell ends, you can use your reaction to end the spell, causing the plates to explode in a protective blast of light. The attack misses, and the attacker as well as each creature of your choice within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} until the end of your next turn.
When the spell ends, the magical plates vanish.

spell.name: Sinking Maw

components.m: an antlion shell filled with sand

entries: Choose a point on the ground that you can see within range. Ground within 30 feet of that point becomes swirling sand until the spell ends. The sand is difficult terrain. Each creature standing on the sand when the spell is cast must make a Dexterity saving throw. Any creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn within the area must also make the saving throw. On a failure, a creature sinks halfway into the sand and becomes {@condition restrained} by the ground.

Until the spell ends, if a creature ends its turn while {@condition restrained} by the ground in this way, it is pulled up to 10 feet toward the center of the area. A {@condition restrained} creature can use its action to make a Strength or Dexterity check (its choice) against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself and clambers onto the surface.

When the spell ends, either because your concentration is broken or because you decide to end it, the ground returns to the solid form it had before the spell was cast. Each creature {@condition restrained} by the spell must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 9d6} nonmagical bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Creatures are still {@condition restrained} by the solid ground (not by any creature or spell) until they escape, and they have disadvantage on ability checks made to escape solid ground.
Creatures with a burrowing speed can't be {@condition restrained} by the ground using this spell.

spell.name: Soar
entries: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 120 feet for the duration. While the target is flying using this speed, it gains a +1 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and opportunity attacks it provokes by flying have disadvantage. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature in range for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Sonic Boom
entries: A bead of thunderous force rockets from your fingertips toward a point you can see within range, where it explodes into a wave of sound that expands to a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature within the area must make a Constitution saving throw.

On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 5d10} thunder damage, is {@condition deafened} until the end of your next turn, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 20 feet away from the center of the area. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}, pushed, or {@condition deafened}.
Unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 20 feet away from the center of the area by the spell's effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d10} and the distance a creature is pushed increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Stampede of Savagery
entries: You call fey spirits to appear as wave of frenzied beasts, which washes over your enemies like a storm of fang and claw in your choice of either a 60-foot-tall cylinder with a 20-foot radius centered on a point you can see within range, or as a 60-foot cone emanating from you.

Ten fey spirits taking the form of beasts appear in unoccupied spaces of your choice within the area. Each beast is challenge rating 1/4 or lower and is also considered fey. A beast disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.

When the beasts appear, each other creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 2d8} piercing damage, {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage, and {@damage 2d8} slashing damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success. This damage is nonmagical.

The summoned beasts are friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for the beasts as a group, which has its own turns. They obey any verbal commands that you issue to them (no action required by you)
If you don't issue any commands to them, they defend themselves from hostile creatures, but otherwise take no actions.
The DM has the creatures' statistics.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th. In addition, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, twice as many creatures appear.

spell.name: Shield Other

time.condition: which you take when another creature within range that you can see is hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell.

entries: A shimmering barrier of magical force appears and protects the attacked creature. Until the start of your next turn, the target has a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and it takes no damage from magic missile.

spell.name: Star Step
entries: You step through the realm of stars, teleporting yourself to an unoccupied space you can see within range.
Immediately after you appear, a blast of light and magical energy courses out of the portal you stepped through.

Each other creature within 30 feet of you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 3d8} force damage and {@damage 3d8} radiant damage, it is knocked {@condition prone}, and it is {@condition blinded} until the start of your next turn. On a success, a creature takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition blinded}.

You can bring along objects as long as their weight doesn't exceed what you can carry. You can also teleport one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. That creature doesn't roll the saving throw. It must be within 5 feet of you when you cast this spell, and there must be an unoccupied space within 5 feet of your destination space for the creature to appear in; otherwise, the creature is left behind.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the radiant damage done increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Steam Strike
entries: You launch a curling blast of scalding hot steam at one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 11d4} fire damage and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the blindness on a success. On a miss, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition blinded}.
Hit or miss, the target's space is filled with steam and mist that makes it lightly obscured until the end of your next turn or until a wind of any speed disperses it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Stone Blast
entries: You summon a group of large stones from a space next to a surface within range that you can see, like a floor, wall, or ceiling. The surface doesn't have to be made of a single contiguous material, but it must be mostly made of earth, sand, stone, metal, crystal or another suitable earthen or stone-like material and it must be at least 3 inches deep, or else the spell fails.

When the stones appear from the surface, you make two spell attacks, magically hurling the stones at targets you can see within 60 feet of the stones' location. Each attack deals {@dice 2d6} nonmagical bludgeoning damage on a hit. You may choose a different target or the same target for any of the attacks, but all targets must be within 30 feet of each other.

The spell attacks you make with this spell determine cover and line of effect as if they were made from the location where the stones were summoned instead of your location, and they ignore disadvantage caused by a target being {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you make one additional attack with the stones for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Storm God's Haste
entries: You touch a willing creature and invest it with lightning speed. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is tripled, it gains a +3 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains two additional actions on each of its turns. These actions can be used only to take the {@action Attack} (one weapon attack only), {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Hide}, or {@action Use an Object} action.

For the duration, the target also has resistance to lightning damage, has advantage on weapon attack rolls, and deals {@dice 1d6} bonus lightning damage when it hits with a weapon attack. In addition, it can use a bonus action on its turn to teleport in a flash of lightning up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

When the spell ends, the target falls {@condition prone} and is both {@condition stunned} and {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn, as a wave of lethargy and electricity, and pain sweeps over it.
A creature affected by this spell gains no benefit from the haste spell.

spell.name: Storm Spear
entries: You form lightning into a crackling spear of energy, which you use to either make one melee spell attack against a target within 5 feet of you or one ranged spell attack against a target that you can see within range. Then the spear vanishes.

On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d8 + 20} lightning damage, and if it isn't immune to the damage, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it falls {@condition prone} and becomes {@condition paralyzed} and {@condition stunned} for the duration. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. On a miss, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects from the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Summon Primal Spirit

m.text: a totem carved to represent a specific primal spirit worth at least 200gp

entries: You commune with an ancient elemental or fey, the one that most resembles the totem you used for a material component as interpreted via ancient traditions. If you have not already become one of the spirit's champions, this spell only lets you mentally communicate with the spirit for the duration. You perceive this as a meeting with the spirit that occurs in the spirit's home realm. If you can convince it that you are worthy of being one of its champions before the spell ends (DM's discretion), you gain the ability to summon it using that totem as a material component when casting the spell.

If you are already one of the spirit's champions when you cast the spell you can instead choose to conjure that spirit as a powerful avatar to fight as your ally, taking the form of a {@filter creature of challenge rating 12 or lower|bestiary|challenge rating=[&0;&12]} in an unoccupied space within range. The avatar is also considered fey or elemental (based on which type the spirit is), and it can speak and understand {@language Druidic}.

The avatar is friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for the avatar, which has its own turns. The avatar obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it (no action required by you} If you don't issue any commands to it, it defends itself from hostile creatures, but otherwise takes no actions.

When the avatar drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends, the avatar disappears, and the spirit remains in its home realm. It is unharmed and unperturbed by anything that happened to the avatar during the spell.
The DM has the avatar creature's statistics.

spell.name: Sun Flower
entries: You conjure a huge spectral sunflower which rises from the ground at a point that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. The flower sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, which is sunlight. The flower is incorporeal and does not occupy space. You can use a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends to cause the flower to release blazing sunlight in a blast. Choose one of the following two options each time you do so.

entries.name: Area Blast
entries: Choose either a 15-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on the flower, a 40-foot cone blasting from the flower, or a line 80 feet long and 5 feet wide blasting from the flower. Each creature in the chosen area must make a Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on this roll.

entries.name: Single Target
entries: Make a ranged spell attack against a target within 150 feet of the flower that you can see. Determine cover and line of effect for this attack as if it was made from the flower's location rather than your location. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} radiant damage. You have advantage on this attack roll against undead and oozes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Swelling Storm
entries: You summon a column of soft rain, mist, and electrified air in a 60-foot-tall cylinder with a 30-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range that lasts until the spell ends. The area is lightly obscured.

Until the spell ends, on each of your turns, you can use an action to strengthen the spell with your magic. If you do, the radius of the area grows by 10 feet for the duration. This cannot extend the radius beyond 60 feet.

At the end of each of your turns while the spell lasts, lightning pulses, and each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes {@damage 3d8} lightning damage, or {@damage 6d8} lightning damage if you cast the spell this turn or you used your action to strengthen it this turn. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the max radius for the area increases by 20 feet for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Swift Ward

time.condition: which you take just before you would take damage

entries: You ward yourself in a hasty barrier of magical energy to protect against danger, granting you a protective ward that lasts until the end of your next turn.

The ward has hit points equal to {@dice 6d6} + twice your spellcasting ability modifier. If you would take damage, the ward blocks and takes that damage instead. The ward cannot block psychic or poison damage unless it is dealt by an attack. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, you take any remaining damage and the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the ward hit points increase by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Swoop

time.condition: which you take immediately after the start of your turn

entries: You take to the air in a burst of brief magical flight. You have a 60 foot flying speed for this turn only. You fall if you are still aloft when the turn ends, unless you can stop the fall.

spell.name: Terra Spike
entries: Choose a creature or object that you can see which is adjacent to a surface within range, like a floor, wall or ceiling. The surface doesn't have to be made of a single contiguous material but it must be mostly made of earth, sand, stone, metal, crystal or another suitable earthen or stone-like material, and it must be at least 6 inches deep, or else the spell fails.

You summon a solid spike out of the surface material to impale the target, which must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes {@dice 3d10} nonmagical piercing damage, or half damage on a success. If the target is flat against the surface, such as a {@condition prone} target being spiked from the ground, the target is imperiled, giving it disadvantage on the saving throw and increasing the damage dealt from {@dice 3d10} to {@dice 3d12}.
The spike crumbles to dust after the saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} or {@dice 1d12} if the target is imperiled for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Terra Steed
entries: You conjure an earthen boulder, which you leap atop as part of casting the spell and your magic causes it to float and fly. You gain a flying speed of 30 feet for the duration. While you fly in this way, the boulder remains beneath you and can provide half cover. If you fall while flying in this way, the spell ends immediately.
In addition, if you fly at least 20 feet straight toward a target using this flying speed on your turn, you can use your bonus action to slam the target using the boulder.
Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 2d6} nonmagical bludgeoning damage.
When the spell ends, the boulder turns to dust and you fall if you are still aloft, unless you can stop the fall

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the flying speed you gain increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Topple
entries: You attempt to knock over one creature that you can see within range using kinetic force. The target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d4} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Torch of Life
entries: You ignite a powerful storm of life energy within the soul of one creature that you can see within range. While the spell lasts, at the end of each of your turns while you are within range of the target, you restore hit points to the target equal to half of its maximum hit points and restore {@dice 4d8} hit points to up to six other creatures of your choice within 30 feet of the target.
In addition, until the spell ends, the target does not lose consciousness or become {@condition incapacitated} for reaching 0 hit points. This does not prevent death.

spell.name: Trailblazer

components.m: a matchstick or a piece of flint

entries: Flames erupt from your back and swirl in a cyclone around your legs to propel you rapidly forward. When the spell is cast and at the start of each of your turns until the spell ends, you gain 60 extra feet of movement for that turn only. In addition, you gain the following benefits for the duration:

items: You do not provoke opportunity attacks by moving.
You can move through other creatures' spaces, and you can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling, but only on your turns.

When you move into a creature's space for the first time on one of your turns, that creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, it takes half damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}. If you end your turn in an occupied space, you fall {@condition prone} in the nearest unoccupied space.

When you move across the ground on your turn, you leave an area of flames in your wake that lasts until the end of your next turn. The path of fire is as wide as your space and reaches 5 feet high. When another creature ends its turn within the flames, it takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage dealt on your turns increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Water Spout
entries: You conjure a stream of pressurized magical water that sprays toward your target. One creature you can see within range must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage and if it is Large or smaller, you push it 10 feet away from you.
This spell conjures 4 gallons of stale water for each die of damage rolled. This water cannot sustain life and instantly vanishes when the spell ends.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Water to Acid

components.m: a vial of acid and a lump of coal

entries: Choose a point you can see within range inside a body of water. The portions of that body of water that fit inside a 50-foot cube centered on that point become highly acidic until the spell ends. Any creature that ends its turn within the area takes {@damage 7d4} acid damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. Objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried also take damage at the end of each of your turns.

While the spell lasts, your magic keeps the acid in the area from mingling with the surrounding water. When the spell ends, the acid returns to its original form as water. This does not alter the composition of the water.

spell.name: Water Whip
entries: You conjure water in the shape of a tentacle-like whip in your free hand. The whip flows from your arm and lasts for the duration. If you let go of the whip, it disappears, but you can conjure it again as a bonus action.

You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the whip that has a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d4} bludgeoning damage, or you can choose to trip the target, dealing it no damage and knocking it {@condition prone} instead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reach of the spell attack increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can conjure a second whip in another hand as part of the same bonus action, and with two whips you can make two spell attacks using your action instead of only one.

spell.name: Windcage
entries: You point at a creature you can see within range, and a powerful gust of wind blows in and carries it away. You push the creature up to 60 feet in any direction, including off the ground and into the air. Until the spell ends, the creature is {@condition restrained} by the swirling wind.

While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target does not fall, it takes {@damage 4d10} bludgeoning damage at the end of each of its turns, and you can use a bonus action on each of your turns after the first to push the target up to 60 feet in any direction, including through the air.

The target can use its action to attempt to escape. It makes a Strength or Dexterity check (its choice) against your spell save DC, with advantage if it has a flying speed. On a success, it frees itself. Once a creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the spell, it falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

spell.name: Wind Wake
entries: You point in a direction and wake the four winds to your aid. Until the spell ends, a hurricane-force wind blows inside a 200-foot cube centered on you that follows you.
The wind blows from one end of the cube to the other in the chosen direction, but it doesn't affect you.

The wind disperses gas or vapor and extinguishes all flames within the area. Any ranged weapon attacks that pass into or through the area automatically miss, and creatures have advantage on any saving throws made against breath effects that blow against the direction of the wind. At the end of each of your turns while the spell lasts, any unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 60 feet away from you by the wind.

Other creatures within the area are {@condition deafened}, and must spend 5 feet of movement for every 1 foot moved against the direction of the wind. In addition, other creatures can't fly within the area. If one is flying when it enters the area, it falls if it can't hover.

Each other creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn in the area must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is pushed 60 feet in the direction of the wind, or pushed only 15 feet on a success. A creature can choose to fail this save automatically.
As a bonus action on each of your turns before the spell ends, you can change the direction of the cube and the wind.

spell.name: Zone of Restoration
entries: You evoke an area of healing magic in the shape of a 25-foot radius sphere centered on a point you choose that you can see within range. The area is filled with sparkling dim light, and it lasts for the duration.

Whenever a friendly creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn within the area, it regains a number of hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If the spell has already healed the creature, it gains that many temporary hit points instead.

When the spell ends, all temporary hit points granted by this spell disappear, but up to ten creatures of your choice each regain hit points equal to the temporary hit points that they had remaining from the spell.
This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

spell.name: Burning Wave
entries: You evoke a wave of billowing flame in the air. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} fire damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Acid Splash}}

spell.name: Storm Whip
entries: You evoke a floating whip of lightning. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Acid Splash}}

spell.name: Vine Lash
entries: You conjure a floating thorny vine which vanishes after striking. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} piercing damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Acid Splash}}

spell.name: Acid Mist
entries: You conjure a misty puff of acid on ground that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the puff of acid fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the puff's space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} acid damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the puff's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell create bonfire}}

spell.name: Churn Earth
entries: You cause the earth to churn and roil like a rock grinder. Until the spell ends, the churning earth fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} nonmagical bludgeoning damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. A creature that is {@condition prone} or burrowing has disadvantage on the save.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Create Bonfire|XGE}}

spell.name: Glowburn
entries: You create a glowing orb of color on ground that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the orb fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the orb's space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} radiant damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the bonfire's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Create Bonfire}}

spell.name: Lashing Leaves
entries: You conjure a spectral plants with waving, slicing leaves on ground that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the plant fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the plant's space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} slashing damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the plant's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Create Bonfire}}

spell.name: Snowfall
entries: You conjure a flurry of icy snow on ground that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the flurry fills a 5-foot cube. Any creature in the flurry's space when you cast the spell must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} cold damage. A creature must also make the saving throw when it moves into the flurry's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Create Bonfire}}

spell.name: Ray of Light
entries: You fire a beam of light at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fire Bolt}}

spell.name: Spark Javelin
entries: You hurl a thin spear of yellow-blue lightning at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} lightning damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Fire Bolt}}

spell.name: Wind Strike
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one target within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. Your reach for this melee attack is the range of the spell instead of its normal reach and the attack also counts as a ranged spell attack.
Your weapon projects a blast, slash or spike of wind as you swing it. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects.

This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the same type as the weapon damage. At 11th level this increases to {@damage 2d8} bonus damage, and at 17th level the bonus increases to {@dice 3d8}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Force Strike|TEB}}

spell.name: Sparking Blade

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell's casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and you can cause green-blue lightning to leap from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes lightning damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

This spell's damage increases when you reach certain levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage to the target on a hit, and the lightning damage to the second creature increases to {@damage 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@damage 1d8} at 11th level ({@damage 2d8} and {@damage 2d8}) and 17th level ({@damage 3d8} and {@damage 3d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Green-Flame Blade}}

spell.name: Spraying Blade

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell's casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and you can cause emerald acid to leap from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes acid damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

This spell's damage increases when you reach certain levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} acid damage to the target on a hit, and the acid damage to the second creature increases to {@damage 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@damage 1d6} at 11th level ({@damage 2d6} and {@damage 2d6}) and 17th level ({@damage 3d6} and {@damage 3d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Green-Flame Blade}}

spell.name: Wind Tunnel
entries: You surround one creature of your choice that you can see within 15 feet of you with a tugging vortex of howling wind. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you and then take {@damage 1d8} thunder damage if it is within 5 feet of you.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Lightning Lure}}

spell.name: Air Slash
entries: You make a spinning blade of air pressure and use it to strike a creature or object that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the target is within 5 feet of you, you can choose to make a melee spell attack against it instead. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} slashing damage. The orb vanishes at the end of the turn.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}) 11th level ({@dice 3d10}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d10})
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Magic Orb|TEB}}

spell.name: Frost Bolt
entries: You conjure a snowball of magically cold ice in your hand and use it to strike a creature or object that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the target is within 5 feet of you, you can choose to make a melee spell attack against it instead. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} cold damage. The orb vanishes at the end of the turn.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d10}) 11th level ({@dice 3d10}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d10})

spell.name: Chill Wind
entries: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and chill the air around them. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d12} cold damage.
A target not surrounded by air is immune to this effect (such as when it is underwater).
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d12}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Poison Spray}}

spell.name: Hot Flash
entries: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and heat the air around them. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d12} fire damage.
A target not surrounded by air is immune to this effect.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d12}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Poison Spray}}

spell.name: Thunderous Vibration
entries: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and violently shake it using sound. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d10} thunder damage.
The sound can be heard up to 100 ft. away.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Poison Spray}}

spell.name: Ember Claws
entries: You channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to be wreathed in fire. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage. After you make the attack, your teeth or fingernails return to normal.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Primal Savagery}}

spell.name: Snow Fang
entries: You channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to become freezing cold. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} cold damage. After you make the attack, your teeth or fingernails return to normal.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Primal Savagery}}

spell.name: Storm Talons
entries: You channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to become electrified. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} lightning damage. After you make the attack, your teeth or fingernails return to normal.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Primal Savagery}}

spell.name: Ray of Stone
entries: A beam of amber light formed of petrifying magic streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ray of Frost}}

spell.name: Burning Sacrifice
entries: A column of golden flames descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} fire damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sacred Flame}}

spell.name: Cold Judgment
entries: A column of silver light shines down to freeze a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} cold damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sacred flame}}

spell.name: Divine Bolt
entries: A thin bolt of golden lightning streaks down from the sky towards a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} lightning damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sacred Flame}}

spell.name: Arc Ring
entries: You create a momentary ring of lightning that sweeps around you. All other creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sword Burst|TCE}}

spell.name: Caustic Flourish
entries: You create a momentary circle of acid that sweeps around you. All other creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} acid damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sword Burst|TEB}}

spell.name: Cinder Swirl
entries: You create a cloud of hot cinders that sweeps around you. All other creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} fire damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sword Burst|TEB}}

spell.name: Needle Surge
entries: Your body sprouts with plantlike needles that burst outward before vanishing. All other creatures within 5 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} piercing damage
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Sword Burst|TEB}}

spell.name: Drain Heat
entries: You drain the heat of creatures around yourself to chill them. Each creature within range, other than you, must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} cold damage.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Thunderclap}}

spell.name: Banish the Weak
entries: You touch a creature you can see within range, and the sound of a harsh and judgmental choir fills the air around it for a moment. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} radiant damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes {@damage 1d12} radiant damage.
The spell's damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8} or {@damage 2d12}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8} or {@damage 3d12}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8} or {@damage 4d12}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Toll the Dead}}

spell.name: Trip
entries: You attempt to knock over one creature that you can see within range by twisting their legs or moving the ground under them. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d4} nonmagical bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Topple|TEB}}

spell.name: Wind Blast
entries: You strike a creature with a blast of roaring, thunderous wind. One creature you can see within range must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target takes {@damage 1d6} thunder damage and if it is Large or smaller, you push it 10 feet away from you.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Water Spout}}

spell.name: Armor of Ashes
entries: A protective magical force surrounds you, manifesting as spectral ashes that covers you and your gear. You gain 5 temporary hit points for the duration. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these hit points, the creature takes 5 fire damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Armor of Agathys}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, both the temporary hit points and the fire damage increase by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Voracious Armor
entries: A protective magical force surrounds you, manifesting as a salivating spectral mouths that cover you and your gear. You gain 5 temporary hit points for the duration. If a creature hits you with a melee attack while you have these hit points, the creature takes 5 acid damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Armor of Agathys}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, both the temporary hit points and the acid damage increase by 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Forked Lightning
entries: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, arcs of sea-green lightning that branch, fork and fan outward shoot forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Burning Hands}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Icy Hands
entries: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, blue-white tendrils of icy cold energy shoot forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Burning Hands}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Guiding Thunderbolt
entries: A thunderbolt of golden lightning streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} lightning damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Guiding Bolt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Electric Rebuke

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see

entries: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by primordial storms. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d10} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Hellish Rebuke}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Howling Rebuke

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see

entries: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by your thunderous voice, which manifests as a spectral wave of greenish energy. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d10} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Hellish Rebuke}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Acid Talon

components.m: a drop of water or piece of ice

entries: You create a spike made of solid acid and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} acid damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ice Knife|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the acid damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Flame Sling

components.m: a drop of water or piece of ice

entries: You create a fiery stone and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage. Hit or miss, the stone then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} fire damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ice Knife}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the fire damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Storm Razor

components.m: a drop of water or piece of ice

entries: You create a spinning spectral blade made out of lightning and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} slashing damage. Hit or miss, the blade then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} lightning damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Ice Knife}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the lightning damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inflict Burns
entries: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} fire damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Inflict Wounds}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inflict Din
entries: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} thunder damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Inflict Wounds}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inflict Rime
entries: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} cold damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Inflict Wounds}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|1-9|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dissolving Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, your weapon splashes acid on the target, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} acid damage to the target and causes the target to be covered in acid. At the start of each of its turns until the spell ends, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@damage 1d6} acid damage. On a successful save, the spell ends. If the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to remove the acid, or if some other effect removes the acid (such as the target being submerged in water), the spell ends.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Searing Smite}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial extra damage dealt by the attack increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Solar Smite
entries: The first time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon flashes with light, illuminating you with bright light until the start of your next turn, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 2d6} radiant damage to the target. Additionally, if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you and knocked {@condition prone}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Thunderous Smite}}

spell.name: Hydrowave
entries: A powerful wave of water sweeps out from you before vanishing. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.
In addition, the spell extinguishes unprotected flames in the area.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Thunderwave}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|1-9|1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Branch Talons
entries: You transform your hand into a collection of sharpened whip branches. The branch flows from your arm and lasts for the duration. If you let go of the branch, it disappears, but you can conjure it again as a bonus action.

You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the whip that has a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d4} piercing damage, or you can choose to trip the target, dealing it no damage and knocking it {@condition prone} instead.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Water Whip|TEB}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reach of the spell attack increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can conjure a second branch in another hand as part of the same bonus action, and with two branches you can make two spell attacks using your action instead of only one.

spell.name: Lesser Lightning Bolt
entries: A line of lightning 30 feet long and 5 feet wide emanates from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d8} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Aganazzar's Scorcher}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Acid Helix
entries: A line of spiraling acid 20 feet long and 5 feet wide emanates from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d8} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Aganazzar's Scorcher|XGE}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Jolting Jaunt
entries: You leap through space in a blur, smashing into a foe as you transform into lightning for a moment. You teleport to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. You can also choose up to one creature in a line 5 feet wide originating at the space you left and ending at the space you teleported to. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

On a failed saving throw, the target takes {@damage 3d10} lightning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Beluud's Brutal Jaunt}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the maximum number of creatures you can target increases by one for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Tailwind
entries: You release strong surge of roaring wind behind you that rockets you into the air. You fly up to 60 feet in a straight line and stop at the first creature you contact. You can choose to make a melee spell attack against the creature, hitting it with a magic barrier. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} thunder damage and {@damage 2d6} force damage, and it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. On a miss, the target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

For this turn, your barrier grants you resistance to damage from falls, and falls do not knock you {@condition prone} upon landing. Upon finishing the movement and attack caused by this spell you fall if you are still aloft, unless you can stop the fall.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the force damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Azure Blaze
entries: You conjure a patch of magical blue flames in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes {@damage 4d4} fire damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried are ignited.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Cloud of Daggers}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d4|2-9|2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Devouring Haze
entries: You fill the air with misty acid in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes {@damage 4d4} acid damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Cloud of Daggers}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 4d4|2-9|2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Storm Blade
entries: You evoke an electric blade in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a scimitar, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the blade, it disappears, but you can evoke the blade again as a bonus action.
You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the electric blade. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage.
The electric blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Blade}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|2,4,6,8|1d6} for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Sunlight Blade
entries: You evoke a golden blade of light in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a scimitar, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the blade, it disappears, but you can evoke the blade again as a bonus action.
You can use your action to make a melee spell attack with the sunlight blade. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} radiant damage.
The sunlight blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flame Blade}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d6|2,4,6,8|1d6} for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Ball Lightning

components.m: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

entries: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of lightning appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn.

When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. The sphere ignites flammable objects not being worn or carried, and it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flaming Sphere}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Giant Snowball

components.m: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron

entries: A 5-foot-diameter snow sphere appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a bonus action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet. If you ram the sphere into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the sphere stops moving this turn.
When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Flaming Sphere}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electrify Metal

components.m: a piece of iron and a flame

entries: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to be filled with an electric current. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes {@damage 2d8} lightning damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your subsequent turns to cause this damage again.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heat Metal}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Freeze Metal

components.m: a piece of iron and a flame

entries: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to freeze. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your subsequent turns to cause this damage again.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Heat Metal}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d8|2-9|1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ringing Ray

m.text: blue amber worth at least 150gp

entries: A translucent beam of sonic vibrations leaps from your outstretched finger to strike one creature that you can see within range. You make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d8} thunder damage and can't take reactions until the end of your next turn.

If damage dealt by this spell forces the target to make a saving throw to maintain concentration, the DC is increased by an amount equal to your spellcasting modifier (minimum +1) and the target has disadvantage on the saving throw.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Jolt of Pain}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electric Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A thin beam of lightning streaks towards a target within range and leaves it briefly electrified. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} lightning damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} lightning damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam electrifies the target with lightning for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Freezing Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A thin beam of blue-white energy streaks towards a target within range and chills it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} cold damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} cold damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam freezes the target for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Electric Beam

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A red-hot beam of searing lava streaks towards a target within range and burns it. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} fire damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} fire damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the beam burns the target with fire for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Sonic Arrow

components.m: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

entries: A gray arrow streaks towards a target within range and bursts into a wave of sonic vibrations. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} thunder damage immediately and {@damage 2d4} thunder damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow attacks the target with sonic waves for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Melf's Acid Arrow}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by {@scaledamage 4d4;2d4|2-9|1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Shards
entries: You create three shards of ice and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Ray}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Darts
entries: You create three rays of lightning and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} lightning damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Rays}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Prismatic Beams
entries: You create three rays of colorful light and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} radiant damage.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Scorching Rays}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Spike Growth

components.m: seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point

entries: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts small flowers coated with caustic acid. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} acid damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Spike Growth}}

spell.name: Searing Charcoal

components.m: seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point

entries: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range is covered with searing charcoals hidden among dust. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes {@damage 2d4} fire damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.
{@note This spell is a variant {@spell Spike Growth}}

spell.name: Storm Cloud
entries: You conjure a gloomy cloud over the head of one creature you can see within range. The cloud follows the target as it moves and releases small bolts of lightning down upon the target at random intervals. At the start of each of the target's turns while the cloud remains, the target and each other creature in the target's space must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 5d4} lightning damage.

The cloud lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. If the target ends any of its turns at least 50 feet away from where it began that turn, the spell immediatly ends. The target's space is lightly obscured for the duration.
{@note This spell is a variant {@spell Acid Cloud}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Smoking Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon is infused with scorching fire and blinding smoke, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} fire damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the spell ends.
A creature {@condition blinded} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition blinded}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blinding Smite}}

spell.name: Traitorous Smite
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon flares with a blinding acid spray, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} acid damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the spell ends.
A creature {@condition blinded} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition blinded}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Blinding Smite}}

spell.name: Acid Shower
entries: A green cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the storm cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. A rain of acid pours from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down acid in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in heavy pollution conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing pollution instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Call Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Hail Blizzard
entries: A snowing cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the snowing cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see under the cloud. A shards of ice fall down from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d10} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down ice in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in extreme cold conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing storm instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d10}.
{@note This spell is a variant of {@spell Call Lightning}}

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or higher level, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rain of Fire
entries: An ash cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see within range directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the storm cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).
